data.text: Hessafe guye ciima olaza doyiza qulpene gita sansalata ba kushen oykida kiitanchay salope duge wodhdhishin beyadis.
he daweza oykid shi laytha qachchides. Hessi dawezi dabulosa woykko xala7e geetettiza kase beni shooshazakko.
Shii layth gakkanaas izi dere asa balethontta mala he kiitanchazi daweza duge ciima ollan yegides. Iza bolla gordidi matama wothides. Izi hessafe guutha wodes birshistanas besses.

Hessafe guye tani algata beyadis. He algata bolla pirda pirdanas godateth isttas imettidayti uttidayta beyadis. Qasseka Yesusa gishshi istti markattida gishshine Xoossa qaala gishshi istta qoodhey qanxettida asata shempoka beyadis. Heytantti do7azasine iza misilezas goynibeyttena. Iza malataka ba liipho bolla gidin ba kushe bolla wothonttaytakko. Istti hayqope dendida Kiristoosara issife shi layth kawotida.
Hanko attida hayqethati qass he shi laythay polettana gakanas hayqope dendibeyttena. Hessika hayqope koyro denthikko.
Koyro denthan dizayti heyti galatetidaytane geeshatakko. Nam7antho hayqos istta bolla wolqay baawa. Istti Xoossa qeessatane Kiristoosa qeessata gidana. Istti Kiristoosara shi laytha kawotana.
He shi laythay polettida mala xala7ey ba qachettida sope birshettana.
Alame bolla diza heytika googene magoge geetettizayta balethanasine istta olas ekki baanas kezana; heytantta qooday abba achchan diza ace malakko.
Istti kumetha biitta bolla laaletidi geeshati dizasoyo dosettida katamayo gidothida shin salope wodhdhida tamay istta dippi histti xuugides.
Kase istta balethida dabulosay he do7azine wordo nabezi dizaso diinen exxiza tama abbagiddon yegettida. Istti heen qamane galas medhinape medhiana gakanas xuugistana.
Hessafe guye issi gita bootha algane he alga bolla uttidayssa, biittayne saloy iza sinthafe baqatida shin istti biidi gelanasoy beettibeyna.
He algaza sinthan hayqida cimatane naatethata beyadis. Maxaafatika doyetida hara deyo maxaafayka doyettides. Hayqidaytika maxaafatan kasee xaafeti diza ba ootho ootho mala pirda ekkida.
Abbayka ba garisan diza hayqethata immides. Hayqoyne duufoy qass ba giddon diza kase hayqidayta immida. Issi issi uray ba ootho ootho mala pirda ekkides.
ayqoyne duufoy tama abba giddo yegettida. Hessika he tama abbazi nam7antho hayqokko.
Iza sunthi deyo maxaafan xaafetonttadey wurikka tama abban yegetides
